meanings.definition: A substance that can be converted into a vitamin within the body.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits rich in provitamin helps your body make essential vitamins.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend consuming foods high in provitamin to support overall health.
meanings.sent3: The provitamin in carrots decided to transform into a superhero vitamin inside the body!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to become a provitamin and save the day was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: Imagine provitamins as tiny vitamin seeds waiting to grow into full-fledged nutrients in your body.

meanings.sent1: The provitamin in the supplement is the first step towards producing vitamin C.
meanings.sent2: Nutritionists emphasize the importance of provitamins in maintaining a balanced diet.
meanings.sent3: The provitamin whispered to the vitamin, 'I'll be there soon, just a step away!'
meanings.sent4: The provitamin acted as a bridge, connecting the body to the final vitamin destination.
meanings.sent5: Watching the provitamin transform into a vitamin is like witnessing a caterpillar turning into a butterfly.
